articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
Re h/t @lund_dane
Dane Lund:‚ÄÇIt is worth noting, the ties between FTX and the SEC go beyond in-person meetings.
The general counsel of FTX US had served as lead counsel to Chairman Gensler at the CFTC. 
By all accounts, he is a standup and excellent attorney. 
The point is that the SEC was pretty close.
articles.title: Re h/t @lund_dane
